mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEDDATE`, t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`, t1.ASSIGNEDTO AS `ASSIGNEDTOPK`, t1.`BRANCH`, t41.`NAME` AS `BRANCHNAME`, t1.`CHILDSTORIES`, t1.`CLOSEDBY`, t1.`CLOSEDDATE`, t1.`CLOSEDREASON`, t1.`COLOR`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`DUPLICATESTORY`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`FROMBUG`, t1.`IBIZ_ID`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCEID`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCENAME`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCEOBJECT`, t1.`ID`, (case when t1.parent in (-1) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '1' when t1.parent in (0) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '2' else '0' end) AS `ISCHILD`, '0' AS `ISFAVORITES`, ( CASE WHEN t1.parent > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END ) AS `ISLEAF`, t1.`KEYWORDS`, t1.`LASTEDITEDBY`, t1.`LASTEDITEDDATE`, t1.`LINKSTORIES`, t1.`MAILTO`, '' AS `MAILTOPK`, t1.`MODULE`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, (case when t1.module = '0' then '/' else (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( tt.NAME SEPARATOR '>' ) FROM zt_module tt WHERE FIND_IN_SET( tt.id, t11.path ) AND tt.type = 'story' GROUP BY tt.root limit 0,1) end) AS `MODULENAME1`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`OPENEDDATE`, t1.`ORG`, t1.`ORGNAME`, t1.`PARENT`, t21.`TITLE` AS `PARENTNAME`, t11.`PATH`, t1.`PLAN`, (select GROUP_CONCAT(t.title) from zt_productplan t where t.deleted = '0' and t.id = t1.`PLAN`) AS `PLANNAME`, t1.`PRI`, t31.`name` AS `PRODOCTNAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`REVIEWEDBY`, t1.`REVIEWEDDATE`, t1.`SOURCE`, t1.`SOURCEID`, t1.`SOURCENAME`, t1.`SOURCENOTE`, t1.`SOURCEOBJECT`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STAGEDBY`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`STORYLATESTFINISHEDDATE`, t1.`STORYPOINTS`, t1.`STORYPROVIDEDATE`, t1.`STORYPROVIDER`, t1.`STORYSN`, t1.`SUBSTATUS`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`TOBUG`, t1.`TYPE`, t1.`VERSION`, t1.`VERSION` AS `VERSIONC` FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_module` t11 ON t1.`MODULE` = t11.`ID` LEFT JOIN `zt_story` t21 ON t1.`PARENT` = t21.`ID` LEFT JOIN `zt_product` t31 ON t1.`PRODUCT` = t31.`id` LEFT JOIN `zt_branch` t41 ON t1.`BRANCH` = t41.`ID`

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEDDATE`, t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`, t1.`BRANCH`, t41.`NAME` AS `BRANCHNAME`, t1.`CHILDSTORIES`, t1.`CLOSEDBY`, t1.`CLOSEDDATE`, t1.`CLOSEDREASON`, t1.`COLOR`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`DUPLICATESTORY`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`FROMBUG`, t1.`ID`, (select (case when COUNT(t.IBZ_FAVORITESID) > 0 then 1 else 0 end ) as ISFAVORITES from T_IBZ_FAVORITES t where t.TYPE = 'story' and t.ACCOUNT = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} and t.OBJECTID = t1.id) AS `ISFAVORITES`, ( CASE WHEN t1.parent > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END ) AS `ISLEAF`, t1.`KEYWORDS`, t1.`LASTEDITEDBY`, t1.`LASTEDITEDDATE`, t1.`LINKSTORIES`, t1.`MAILTO`, t1.`MODULE`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( tt.NAME SEPARATOR '>' ) FROM zt_module tt WHERE FIND_IN_SET( tt.id, t11.path ) AND tt.type = 'story' GROUP BY tt.root ) AS `MODULENAME1`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`OPENEDDATE`, t1.`PARENT`, t21.`TITLE` AS `PARENTNAME`, t11.`PATH`, t1.`PLAN`, t1.`PRI`, t31.`NAME` AS `PRODOCTNAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`REVIEWEDBY`, t1.`REVIEWEDDATE`, t1.`SOURCE`, t1.`SOURCENOTE`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STAGEDBY`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`SUBSTATUS`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`TOBUG`, t1.`TYPE`, t1.`VERSION`, t1.`VERSION` AS `VERSIONC`, (case when t1.parent in (-1) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '1' when t1.parent in (0) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '2' else '0' end) AS isChild, t1.STORYSN FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.MODULE = t11.ID LEFT JOIN zt_story t21 ON t1.PARENT = t21.ID LEFT JOIN zt_product t31 ON t1.PRODUCT = t31.ID LEFT JOIN zt_branch t41 ON t1.BRANCH = t41.ID
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
AND ( t1.`ASSIGNEDTO` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} )

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEDDATE`, t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`, t1.`BRANCH`, t41.`NAME` AS `BRANCHNAME`, t1.`CHILDSTORIES`, t1.`CLOSEDBY`, t1.`CLOSEDDATE`, t1.`CLOSEDREASON`, t1.`COLOR`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`DUPLICATESTORY`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`FROMBUG`, t1.`ID`, (select (case when COUNT(t.IBZ_FAVORITESID) > 0 then 1 else 0 end ) as ISFAVORITES from T_IBZ_FAVORITES t where t.TYPE = 'story' and t.ACCOUNT = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} and t.OBJECTID = t1.id) AS `ISFAVORITES`, ( CASE WHEN t1.parent > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END ) AS `ISLEAF`, t1.`KEYWORDS`, t1.`LASTEDITEDBY`, t1.`LASTEDITEDDATE`, t1.`LINKSTORIES`, t1.`MAILTO`, t1.`MODULE`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( tt.NAME SEPARATOR '>' ) FROM zt_module tt WHERE FIND_IN_SET( tt.id, t11.path ) AND tt.type = 'story' GROUP BY tt.root ) AS `MODULENAME1`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`OPENEDDATE`, t1.`PARENT`, t21.`TITLE` AS `PARENTNAME`, t11.`PATH`, t1.`PLAN`, t1.`PRI`, t31.`NAME` AS `PRODOCTNAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`REVIEWEDBY`, t1.`REVIEWEDDATE`, t1.`SOURCE`, t1.`SOURCENOTE`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STAGEDBY`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`SUBSTATUS`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`TOBUG`, t1.`TYPE`, t1.`VERSION`, t1.`VERSION` AS `VERSIONC`, (case when t1.parent in (-1) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '1' when t1.parent in (0) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '2' else '0' end) AS isChild, t1.STORYSN FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.MODULE = t11.ID LEFT JOIN zt_story t21 ON t1.PARENT = t21.ID LEFT JOIN zt_product t31 ON t1.PRODUCT = t31.ID LEFT JOIN zt_branch t41 ON t1.BRANCH = t41.ID
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
AND ( t1.`ASSIGNEDTO` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} )
AND t1.assignedDate <> '0000-00-00 00:00:00' and t1.assignedDate is not null

SELECT t1.`BRANCH`, t1.`COLOR`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`ID`, t1.`MODULE`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`PARENT`, t11.`PATH`, t1.`PLAN`, t1.`PRI`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`STATUS`, CONCAT(t1.id,':',t1.title,'(优先级:',t1.pri,',预计工时:',t1.estimate,')') AS `TITLE`, t1.`TYPE`, t1.`VERSION`, t1.STORYSN FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.MODULE = t11.ID LEFT JOIN zt_story t21 ON t1.PARENT = t21.ID LEFT JOIN zt_product t31 ON t1.PRODUCT = t31.ID LEFT JOIN zt_branch t41 ON t1.BRANCH = t41.ID
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
AND ( ( EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM zt_projectstory t51 WHERE t1.ID = t51.STORY AND ( t51.`PROJECT` = #{srf.datacontext.n_project_eq}) ) OR #{srf.datacontext.n_project_eq} is null ) )
AND (t1.product = #{srf.datacontext.product} or t1.id = #{srf.datacontext.story})

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`ID`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`PLAN`, t1.`PRI`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`TITLE` , t1.STORYSN FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.MODULE = t11.ID LEFT JOIN zt_story t21 ON t1.PARENT = t21.ID LEFT JOIN zt_product t31 ON t1.PRODUCT = t31.ID LEFT JOIN zt_branch t41 ON t1.BRANCH = t41.ID
AND t1.DELETED = '0' AND t1.id IN ( SELECT tt.story FROM zt_projectstory tt WHERE tt.project = ( SELECT ttt.project FROM zt_build ttt WHERE ttt.id = #{srf.datacontext.build} ) ) AND t1.product = ( SELECT t2.product FROM zt_build t2 WHERE t2.id = #{srf.datacontext.build} ) AND t1.id NOT IN ( SELECT t3.id FROM zt_story t3, zt_build t4 WHERE t4.id = #{srf.datacontext.build} AND FIND_IN_SET( t3.id, t4.stories ) )

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEDDATE`, t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`, t1.`BRANCH`, t41.`NAME` AS `BRANCHNAME`, t1.`CHILDSTORIES`, t1.`CLOSEDBY`, t1.`CLOSEDDATE`, t1.`CLOSEDREASON`, t1.`COLOR`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`DUPLICATESTORY`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`FROMBUG`, t1.`ID`, (select (case when COUNT(t.IBZ_FAVORITESID) > 0 then 1 else 0 end ) as ISFAVORITES from T_IBZ_FAVORITES t where t.TYPE = 'story' and t.ACCOUNT = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} and t.OBJECTID = t1.id) AS `ISFAVORITES`, ( CASE WHEN t1.parent > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END ) AS `ISLEAF`, t1.`KEYWORDS`, t1.`LASTEDITEDBY`, t1.`LASTEDITEDDATE`, t1.`LINKSTORIES`, t1.`MAILTO`, t1.`MODULE`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`OPENEDDATE`, t1.`PARENT`, t21.`TITLE` AS `PARENTNAME`, t11.`PATH`, t1.`PLAN`, t1.`PRI`, t31.`NAME` AS `PRODOCTNAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`REVIEWEDBY`, t1.`REVIEWEDDATE`, t1.`SOURCE`, t1.`SOURCENOTE`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STAGEDBY`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`SUBSTATUS`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`TOBUG`, t1.`TYPE`, t1.`VERSION`, (case when t1.parent in (-1) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '1' when t1.parent in (0) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '2' else '0' end) AS isChild, t1.`STORYSN` FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.MODULE = t11.id LEFT JOIN zt_story t21 ON t1.PARENT = t21.id LEFT JOIN zt_product t31 ON t1.PRODUCT = t31.id LEFT JOIN zt_branch t41 ON t1.BRANCH = t41.id
AND t1.`product` in ( select t2.`product` from zt_projectproduct t2 where t2.project = #{srf.datacontext.project} )
AND t1.`STATUS` = 'active'
AND t1.DELETED = '0'

SELECT t1.`COLOR`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`ID`, ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN COUNT( t.IBZ_FAVORITESID ) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS ISFAVORITES FROM T_IBZ_FAVORITES t WHERE t.TYPE = 'story' AND t.ACCOUNT = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} AND t.OBJECTID = t1.id ) AS `ISFAVORITES`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`PRI`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`TITLE`, '' AS isChild , t1.STORYSN FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.MODULE = t11.MODULESN LEFT JOIN zt_story t21 ON t1.PARENT = t21.STORYSN LEFT JOIN zt_product t31 ON t1.PRODUCT = t31.productsn LEFT JOIN zt_branch t41 ON t1.BRANCH = t41.BRANCHSN
AND t1.`DELETED` = '0' AND FIND_IN_SET ( t1.ID, ( SELECT STORIES FROM ZT_BUILD WHERE ID = #{srf.datacontext.srfparentkey} ) )

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`, t1.`COLOR`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`ID`, t1.`product`, ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN COUNT( t.IBZ_FAVORITESID ) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS ISFAVORITES FROM T_IBZ_FAVORITES t WHERE t.TYPE = 'story' AND t.ACCOUNT = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} AND t.OBJECTID = t1.id ) AS `ISFAVORITES`, t1.`MODULE`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`PARENT`, ( CASE WHEN t1.`PLAN` = '0' THEN '' ELSE t1.plan END ) AS `PLAN`, (select GROUP_CONCAT(t.title) from zt_productplan t where t.deleted = '0' and t.id = t1.plan) as planname, t1.`PRI`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`TITLE`, '' AS isChild , t1.STORYSN FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.MODULE = t11.id LEFT JOIN zt_story t21 ON t1.PARENT = t21.id LEFT JOIN zt_product t31 ON t1.PRODUCT = t31.id
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
AND FIND_IN_SET (#{srf.datacontext.srfparentkey}, t11.`PATH`)

SELECT t1.`BRANCH`, t1.`COLOR`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`ID`, t1.`MODULE`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`PARENT`, t11.`PATH`, t1.`PLAN`, t1.`PRI`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`STATUS`, CONCAT(t1.id,':',t1.title,'(优先级:',t1.pri,',预计工时:',t1.estimate,')') AS `TITLE`, t1.`TYPE`, t1.`VERSION`, t1.STORYSN FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.MODULE = t11.id LEFT JOIN zt_story t21 ON t1.PARENT = t21.id LEFT JOIN zt_product t31 ON t1.PRODUCT = t31.id LEFT JOIN zt_branch t41 ON t1.BRANCH = t41.id
AND t1.deleted = '0'
AND (t1.product = #{srf.datacontext.product} or t1.id = #{srf.datacontext.story})

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`, t1.`COLOR`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`ID`, t1.`product`, ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN COUNT( t.IBZ_FAVORITESID ) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS ISFAVORITES FROM T_IBZ_FAVORITES t WHERE t.TYPE = 'story' AND t.ACCOUNT = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} AND t.OBJECTID = t1.id ) AS `ISFAVORITES`, t1.`MODULE`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, ( CASE WHEN t1.`PLAN` = '0' THEN '' ELSE t1.plan END ) AS `PLAN`, (select GROUP_CONCAT(t.title) from zt_productplan t where t.deleted = '0' and t.id = t1.plan) as planname, t1.`PRI`, t31.`NAME` AS `PRODOCTNAME`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`TITLE`, '' AS isChild , t1.STORYSN FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.MODULE = t11.ID LEFT JOIN zt_story t21 ON t1.PARENT = t21.ID LEFT JOIN zt_product t31 ON t1.PRODUCT = t31.ID LEFT JOIN zt_branch t41 ON t1.BRANCH = t41.ID
AND t1.DELETED = '0'

SELECT t1.`ID`, t1.`TITLE`, t11.orgid, t11.MDEPTID, t1.deleted, t21.spec, t1.color, t11.acl, CONCAT_WS( ',', t11.CREATEDBY, t11.qd, t11.po, t11.rd ) AS acllist, t1.product FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_product t11 ON t11.id = t1.product LEFT JOIN zt_storyspec t21 ON t21.story = t1.id AND t1.version = t21.version

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEDDATE`, t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`, t1.ASSIGNEDTO AS `ASSIGNEDTOPK`, t1.`BRANCH`, t41.`NAME` AS `BRANCHNAME`, t1.`CHILDSTORIES`, t1.`CLOSEDBY`, t1.`CLOSEDDATE`, t1.`CLOSEDREASON`, t1.`COLOR`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`DUPLICATESTORY`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`FROMBUG`, t1.`IBIZ_ID`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCEID`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCENAME`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCEOBJECT`, t1.`ID`, (case when t1.parent in (-1) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '1' when t1.parent in (0) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '2' else '0' end) AS `ISCHILD`, '0' AS `ISFAVORITES`, ( CASE WHEN t1.parent > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END ) AS `ISLEAF`, t1.`KEYWORDS`, t1.`LASTEDITEDBY`, t1.`LASTEDITEDDATE`, t1.`LINKSTORIES`, t1.`MAILTO`, '' AS `MAILTOPK`, t1.`MODULE`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, (case when t1.module = '0' then '/' else (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( tt.NAME SEPARATOR '>' ) FROM zt_module tt WHERE FIND_IN_SET( tt.id, t11.path ) AND tt.type = 'story' GROUP BY tt.root limit 0,1) end) AS `MODULENAME1`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`OPENEDDATE`, t1.`ORG`, t1.`ORGNAME`, t1.`PARENT`, t21.`TITLE` AS `PARENTNAME`, t11.`PATH`, t1.`PLAN`, (select GROUP_CONCAT(t.title) from zt_productplan t where t.deleted = '0' and t.id = t1.`PLAN`) AS `PLANNAME`, t1.`PRI`, t31.`name` AS `PRODOCTNAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`REVIEWEDBY`, t1.`REVIEWEDDATE`, t1.`SOURCE`, t1.`SOURCEID`, t1.`SOURCENAME`, t1.`SOURCENOTE`, t1.`SOURCEOBJECT`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STAGEDBY`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`STORYLATESTFINISHEDDATE`, t1.`STORYPOINTS`, t1.`STORYPROVIDEDATE`, t1.`STORYPROVIDER`, t1.`STORYSN`, t1.`SUBSTATUS`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`TOBUG`, t1.`TYPE`, t1.`VERSION`, t1.`VERSION` AS `VERSIONC` FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_module` t11 ON t1.`MODULE` = t11.`ID` LEFT JOIN `zt_story` t21 ON t1.`PARENT` = t21.`ID` LEFT JOIN `zt_product` t31 ON t1.`PRODUCT` = t31.`id` LEFT JOIN `zt_branch` t41 ON t1.`BRANCH` = t41.`ID`
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
AND ( t1.`PRODUCT` = #{srf.datacontext.product} AND t1.`BRANCH` = #{srf.datacontext.branch} 1=1 AND t1.`MODULE` = #{srf.datacontext.nodeid} 1=1 )

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEDDATE`, case when t51.`AGENTUSER` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} then t51.`AGENTUSER` else t1.`ASSIGNEDTO` end as `ASSIGNEDTO`, t1.`BRANCH`, t41.`NAME` AS `BRANCHNAME`, t1.`CHILDSTORIES`, t1.`CLOSEDBY`, t1.`CLOSEDDATE`, t1.`CLOSEDREASON`, t1.`COLOR`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`DUPLICATESTORY`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`FROMBUG`, t1.`ID`, (select (case when COUNT(t.IBZ_FAVORITESID) > 0 then 1 else 0 end ) as ISFAVORITES from T_IBZ_FAVORITES t where t.TYPE = 'story' and t.ACCOUNT = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} and t.OBJECTID = t1.id) AS `ISFAVORITES`, ( CASE WHEN t1.parent > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END ) AS `ISLEAF`, t1.`KEYWORDS`, t1.`LASTEDITEDBY`, t1.`LASTEDITEDDATE`, t1.`LINKSTORIES`, t1.`MAILTO`, t1.`MODULE`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( tt.NAME SEPARATOR '>' ) FROM zt_module tt WHERE FIND_IN_SET( tt.id, t11.path ) AND tt.type = 'story' GROUP BY tt.root ) AS `MODULENAME1`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`OPENEDDATE`, t1.`PARENT`, t21.`TITLE` AS `PARENTNAME`, t11.`PATH`, (case when t1.`PLAN` = '0' then '' else t1.plan end ) as `PLAN`, t1.`PRI`, t31.`NAME` AS `PRODOCTNAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`REVIEWEDBY`, t1.`REVIEWEDDATE`, t1.`SOURCE`, t1.`SOURCENOTE`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STAGEDBY`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`SUBSTATUS`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`TOBUG`, t1.`TYPE`, t1.`VERSION`, t1.`VERSION` AS `VERSIONC`, (case when t1.parent in (-1) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '1' when t1.parent in (0) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '2' else '0' end) AS isChild, t1.STORYSN FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.MODULE = t11.ID LEFT JOIN zt_story t21 ON t1.PARENT = t21.ID LEFT JOIN zt_product t31 ON t1.PRODUCT = t31.ID LEFT JOIN zt_branch t41 ON t1.BRANCH = t41.ID LEFT JOIN t_ibz_agent t51 ON t1.assignedTo = t51.CREATEMANNAME and DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') >= t51.AGENTBEGIN and DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') <= t51.AGENTEND
AND t1.deleted = '0'

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEDDATE`, t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`, t1.ASSIGNEDTO AS `ASSIGNEDTOPK`, t1.`BRANCH`, t41.`NAME` AS `BRANCHNAME`, t1.`CHILDSTORIES`, t1.`CLOSEDBY`, t1.`CLOSEDDATE`, t1.`CLOSEDREASON`, t1.`COLOR`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`DUPLICATESTORY`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`FROMBUG`, t1.`IBIZ_ID`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCEID`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCENAME`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCEOBJECT`, t1.`ID`, (case when t1.parent in (-1) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '1' when t1.parent in (0) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '2' else '0' end) AS `ISCHILD`, '0' AS `ISFAVORITES`, ( CASE WHEN t1.parent > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END ) AS `ISLEAF`, t1.`KEYWORDS`, t1.`LASTEDITEDBY`, t1.`LASTEDITEDDATE`, t1.`LINKSTORIES`, t1.`MAILTO`, '' AS `MAILTOPK`, t1.`MODULE`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, (case when t1.module = '0' then '/' else (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( tt.NAME SEPARATOR '>' ) FROM zt_module tt WHERE FIND_IN_SET( tt.id, t11.path ) AND tt.type = 'story' GROUP BY tt.root limit 0,1) end) AS `MODULENAME1`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`OPENEDDATE`, t1.`ORG`, t1.`ORGNAME`, t1.`PARENT`, t21.`TITLE` AS `PARENTNAME`, t11.`PATH`, t1.`PLAN`, (select GROUP_CONCAT(t.title) from zt_productplan t where t.deleted = '0' and t.id = t1.`PLAN`) AS `PLANNAME`, t1.`PRI`, t31.`name` AS `PRODOCTNAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`REVIEWEDBY`, t1.`REVIEWEDDATE`, t1.`SOURCE`, t1.`SOURCEID`, t1.`SOURCENAME`, t1.`SOURCENOTE`, t1.`SOURCEOBJECT`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STAGEDBY`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`STORYLATESTFINISHEDDATE`, t1.`STORYPOINTS`, t1.`STORYPROVIDEDATE`, t1.`STORYPROVIDER`, t1.`STORYSN`, t1.`SUBSTATUS`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`TOBUG`, t1.`TYPE`, t1.`VERSION`, t1.`VERSION` AS `VERSIONC` FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_module` t11 ON t1.`MODULE` = t11.`ID` LEFT JOIN `zt_story` t21 ON t1.`PARENT` = t21.`ID` LEFT JOIN `zt_product` t31 ON t1.`PRODUCT` = t31.`id` LEFT JOIN `zt_branch` t41 ON t1.`BRANCH` = t41.`ID`
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
AND ( ( t1.`LASTEDITEDBY` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} OR t1.`CLOSEDBY` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} OR t1.`REVIEWEDBY` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} OR t1.`OPENEDBY` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} OR t1.`ASSIGNEDTO` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} ) )

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEDDATE`, t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`, t1.ASSIGNEDTO AS `ASSIGNEDTOPK`, t1.`BRANCH`, t41.`NAME` AS `BRANCHNAME`, t1.`CHILDSTORIES`, t1.`CLOSEDBY`, t1.`CLOSEDDATE`, t1.`CLOSEDREASON`, t1.`COLOR`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`DUPLICATESTORY`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`FROMBUG`, t1.`IBIZ_ID`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCEID`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCENAME`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCEOBJECT`, t1.`ID`, (case when t1.parent in (-1) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '1' when t1.parent in (0) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '2' else '0' end) AS `ISCHILD`, '0' AS `ISFAVORITES`, ( CASE WHEN t1.parent > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END ) AS `ISLEAF`, t1.`KEYWORDS`, t1.`LASTEDITEDBY`, t1.`LASTEDITEDDATE`, t1.`LINKSTORIES`, t1.`MAILTO`, '' AS `MAILTOPK`, t1.`MODULE`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, (case when t1.module = '0' then '/' else (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( tt.NAME SEPARATOR '>' ) FROM zt_module tt WHERE FIND_IN_SET( tt.id, t11.path ) AND tt.type = 'story' GROUP BY tt.root limit 0,1) end) AS `MODULENAME1`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`OPENEDDATE`, t1.`ORG`, t1.`ORGNAME`, t1.`PARENT`, t21.`TITLE` AS `PARENTNAME`, t11.`PATH`, t1.`PLAN`, (select GROUP_CONCAT(t.title) from zt_productplan t where t.deleted = '0' and t.id = t1.`PLAN`) AS `PLANNAME`, t1.`PRI`, t31.`name` AS `PRODOCTNAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`REVIEWEDBY`, t1.`REVIEWEDDATE`, t1.`SOURCE`, t1.`SOURCEID`, t1.`SOURCENAME`, t1.`SOURCENOTE`, t1.`SOURCEOBJECT`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STAGEDBY`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`STORYLATESTFINISHEDDATE`, t1.`STORYPOINTS`, t1.`STORYPROVIDEDATE`, t1.`STORYPROVIDER`, t1.`STORYSN`, t1.`SUBSTATUS`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`TOBUG`, t1.`TYPE`, t1.`VERSION`, t1.`VERSION` AS `VERSIONC` FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_module` t11 ON t1.`MODULE` = t11.`ID` LEFT JOIN `zt_story` t21 ON t1.`PARENT` = t21.`ID` LEFT JOIN `zt_product` t31 ON t1.`PRODUCT` = t31.`id` LEFT JOIN `zt_branch` t41 ON t1.`BRANCH` = t41.`ID`
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
AND ( DATE_FORMAT( t1.openedDate, '%Y' ) = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y' ) AND t1.`OPENEDBY` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} )

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`, t1.`COLOR`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`ID`, 1 AS `ISFAVORITES`, t1.`MODULE`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`PLAN`, t1.`PRI`, t31.`NAME` AS `PRODOCTNAME`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`TITLE`, '' AS isChild , t1.STORYSN FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.MODULE = t11.ID LEFT JOIN zt_story t21 ON t1.PARENT = t21.ID LEFT JOIN zt_product t31 ON t1.PRODUCT = t31.ID LEFT JOIN zt_branch t41 ON t1.BRANCH = t41.ID
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
AND t1.id in (select t.OBJECTID from T_IBZ_FAVORITES t where t.type = 'story' and t.account = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname})

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEDDATE`, t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`, t1.ASSIGNEDTO AS `ASSIGNEDTOPK`, t1.`BRANCH`, t41.`NAME` AS `BRANCHNAME`, t1.`CHILDSTORIES`, t1.`CLOSEDBY`, t1.`CLOSEDDATE`, t1.`CLOSEDREASON`, t1.`COLOR`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`DUPLICATESTORY`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`FROMBUG`, t1.`IBIZ_ID`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCEID`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCENAME`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCEOBJECT`, t1.`ID`, (case when t1.parent in (-1) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '1' when t1.parent in (0) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '2' else '0' end) AS `ISCHILD`, '0' AS `ISFAVORITES`, ( CASE WHEN t1.parent > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END ) AS `ISLEAF`, t1.`KEYWORDS`, t1.`LASTEDITEDBY`, t1.`LASTEDITEDDATE`, t1.`LINKSTORIES`, t1.`MAILTO`, '' AS `MAILTOPK`, t1.`MODULE`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, (case when t1.module = '0' then '/' else (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( tt.NAME SEPARATOR '>' ) FROM zt_module tt WHERE FIND_IN_SET( tt.id, t11.path ) AND tt.type = 'story' GROUP BY tt.root limit 0,1) end) AS `MODULENAME1`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`OPENEDDATE`, t1.`ORG`, t1.`ORGNAME`, t1.`PARENT`, t21.`TITLE` AS `PARENTNAME`, t11.`PATH`, t1.`PLAN`, (select GROUP_CONCAT(t.title) from zt_productplan t where t.deleted = '0' and t.id = t1.`PLAN`) AS `PLANNAME`, t1.`PRI`, t31.`name` AS `PRODOCTNAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`REVIEWEDBY`, t1.`REVIEWEDDATE`, t1.`SOURCE`, t1.`SOURCEID`, t1.`SOURCENAME`, t1.`SOURCENOTE`, t1.`SOURCEOBJECT`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STAGEDBY`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`STORYLATESTFINISHEDDATE`, t1.`STORYPOINTS`, t1.`STORYPROVIDEDATE`, t1.`STORYPROVIDER`, t1.`STORYSN`, t1.`SUBSTATUS`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`TOBUG`, t1.`TYPE`, t1.`VERSION`, t1.`VERSION` AS `VERSIONC` FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_module` t11 ON t1.`MODULE` = t11.`ID` LEFT JOIN `zt_story` t21 ON t1.`PARENT` = t21.`ID` LEFT JOIN `zt_product` t31 ON t1.`PRODUCT` = t31.`id` LEFT JOIN `zt_branch` t41 ON t1.`BRANCH` = t41.`ID`
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
AND ( t1.product IN ( SELECT t.`id` FROM zt_product t WHERE t.`deleted` = '0' AND ( t.`acl` = 'open' OR ( ( t.`acl` = 'private' AND ( t.`updateby` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} OR t.`createdby` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} OR t.`qd` =#{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} OR t.`rd` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} OR t.`po` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} ) ) OR ( t.id IN ( SELECT t.root FROM zt_team t WHERE t.account =#{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} AND t.type = 'product' ) ) ) ) ) )

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`, t1.`COLOR`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`ID`, t1.`product`, ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN COUNT( t.IBZ_FAVORITESID ) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS ISFAVORITES FROM T_IBZ_FAVORITES t WHERE t.TYPE = 'story' AND t.ACCOUNT = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} AND t.OBJECTID = t1.id ) AS `ISFAVORITES`, t1.`MODULE`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`PARENT`, ( CASE WHEN t1.`PLAN` = '0' THEN '' ELSE t1.plan END ) AS `PLAN`, (select GROUP_CONCAT(t.title) from zt_productplan t where t.deleted = '0' and t.id = t1.plan) as planname, t1.`PRI`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`TITLE`, '' AS isChild, t1.STORYSN FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.MODULE = t11.ID LEFT JOIN zt_story t21 ON t1.PARENT = t21.ID LEFT JOIN zt_product t31 ON t1.PRODUCT = t31.ID LEFT JOIN zt_branch t41 ON t1.BRANCH = t41.ID
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
AND ( ( t1.`PARENT` = -1 OR t1.`PARENT` = 0 ) )

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEDDATE`, t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`, t1.`BRANCH`, t41.`NAME` AS `BRANCHNAME`, t1.`CHILDSTORIES`, t1.`CLOSEDBY`, t1.`CLOSEDDATE`, t1.`CLOSEDREASON`, t1.`COLOR`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`DUPLICATESTORY`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`FROMBUG`, t1.`ID`, (select (case when COUNT(t.IBZ_FAVORITESID) > 0 then 1 else 0 end ) as ISFAVORITES from T_IBZ_FAVORITES t where t.TYPE = 'story' and t.ACCOUNT = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} and t.OBJECTID = t1.id) AS `ISFAVORITES`, ( CASE WHEN t1.parent > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END ) AS `ISLEAF`, t1.`KEYWORDS`, t1.`LASTEDITEDBY`, t1.`LASTEDITEDDATE`, t1.`LINKSTORIES`, t1.`MAILTO`, t1.`MODULE`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( tt.NAME SEPARATOR '>' ) FROM zt_module tt WHERE FIND_IN_SET( tt.id, t11.path ) AND tt.type = 'story' GROUP BY tt.root ) AS `MODULENAME1`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`OPENEDDATE`, t1.`PARENT`, t21.`TITLE` AS `PARENTNAME`, t11.`PATH`, (case when t1.`PLAN` = '0' then '' else t1.plan end ) as `PLAN`, t1.`PRI`, t31.`NAME` AS `PRODOCTNAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`REVIEWEDBY`, t1.`REVIEWEDDATE`, t1.`SOURCE`, t1.`SOURCENOTE`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STAGEDBY`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`SUBSTATUS`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`TOBUG`, t1.`TYPE`, t1.`VERSION`, t1.`VERSION` AS `VERSIONC`, (case when t1.parent in (-1) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '1' when t1.parent in (0) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '2' else '0' end) AS isChild, t1.STORYSN FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.MODULE = t11.ID LEFT JOIN zt_story t21 ON t1.PARENT = t21.ID LEFT JOIN zt_product t31 ON t1.PRODUCT = t31.ID LEFT JOIN zt_branch t41 ON t1.BRANCH = t41.ID
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
AND ( ( t1.`PARENT` = -1 OR t1.`PARENT` = 0 ) )
AND t1.`status` = 'active' and t1.stage = 'wait'

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEDDATE`, t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`, t1.ASSIGNEDTO AS `ASSIGNEDTOPK`, t1.`BRANCH`, t41.`NAME` AS `BRANCHNAME`, t1.`CHILDSTORIES`, t1.`CLOSEDBY`, t1.`CLOSEDDATE`, t1.`CLOSEDREASON`, t1.`COLOR`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`DUPLICATESTORY`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`FROMBUG`, t1.`IBIZ_ID`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCEID`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCENAME`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCEOBJECT`, t1.`ID`, (case when t1.parent in (-1) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '1' when t1.parent in (0) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '2' else '0' end) AS `ISCHILD`, '0' AS `ISFAVORITES`, ( CASE WHEN t1.parent > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END ) AS `ISLEAF`, t1.`KEYWORDS`, t1.`LASTEDITEDBY`, t1.`LASTEDITEDDATE`, t1.`LINKSTORIES`, t1.`MAILTO`, '' AS `MAILTOPK`, t1.`MODULE`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, (case when t1.module = '0' then '/' else (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( tt.NAME SEPARATOR '>' ) FROM zt_module tt WHERE FIND_IN_SET( tt.id, t11.path ) AND tt.type = 'story' GROUP BY tt.root limit 0,1) end) AS `MODULENAME1`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`OPENEDDATE`, t1.`ORG`, t1.`ORGNAME`, t1.`PARENT`, t21.`TITLE` AS `PARENTNAME`, t11.`PATH`, t1.`PLAN`, (select GROUP_CONCAT(t.title) from zt_productplan t where t.deleted = '0' and t.id = t1.`PLAN`) AS `PLANNAME`, t1.`PRI`, t31.`name` AS `PRODOCTNAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`REVIEWEDBY`, t1.`REVIEWEDDATE`, t1.`SOURCE`, t1.`SOURCEID`, t1.`SOURCENAME`, t1.`SOURCENOTE`, t1.`SOURCEOBJECT`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STAGEDBY`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`STORYLATESTFINISHEDDATE`, t1.`STORYPOINTS`, t1.`STORYPROVIDEDATE`, t1.`STORYPROVIDER`, t1.`STORYSN`, t1.`SUBSTATUS`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`TOBUG`, t1.`TYPE`, t1.`VERSION`, t1.`VERSION` AS `VERSIONC` FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_module` t11 ON t1.`MODULE` = t11.`ID` LEFT JOIN `zt_story` t21 ON t1.`PARENT` = t21.`ID` LEFT JOIN `zt_product` t31 ON t1.`PRODUCT` = t31.`id` LEFT JOIN `zt_branch` t41 ON t1.`BRANCH` = t41.`ID` RIGHT JOIN `zt_product` t51 ON t1.`PRODUCT` = t51.`id` LEFT OUTER JOIN `zt_projectproduct` t61 ON t51.`id` = t61.`PRODUCT`
AND ( t61.`PROJECT` = #{srf.webcontext.project} AND (t61.plan = 0 or t1.plan = t61.plan or t1.plan in (select t.id from zt_productplan t where t.parent = t61.plan)) )
AND NOT(EXISTS(SELECT * FROM `zt_projectstory` t71 WHERE t1.`ID` = t71.`STORY` AND ( t71.`PROJECT` = #{srf.webcontext.project} ) ))
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
AND ( t1.`STATUS` NOT IN ('draft','closed') )

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`ID`, '' AS `ISCHILD`, '0' AS `ISFAVORITES`, t1.`MODULE`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`PLAN`, (select GROUP_CONCAT(t.title) from zt_productplan t where t.deleted = '0' and t.id = t1.plan) as planname, t1.`PRI`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`TITLE`, #{srf.datacontext.srfparentkey} AS project , t1.STORYSN FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.MODULE = t11.id LEFT JOIN zt_story t21 ON t1.PARENT = t21.id LEFT JOIN zt_product t31 ON t1.PRODUCT = t31.id LEFT JOIN zt_branch t41 ON t1.BRANCH = t41.id
AND EXISTS(SELECT * FROM zt_projectstory t51 WHERE t1.ID = t51.STORY AND ( t51.`PROJECT` = #{srf.datacontext.srfparentkey}) )
AND t1.DELETED = '0'

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`ID`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`PLAN`, t1.`PRI`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`TITLE` , t1.STORYSN FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.MODULE = t11.ID LEFT JOIN zt_story t21 ON t1.PARENT = t21.ID LEFT JOIN zt_product t31 ON t1.PRODUCT = t31.ID LEFT JOIN zt_branch t41 ON t1.BRANCH = t41.ID
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
AND (t1.id IN ( select tt3.story from zt_release tt1 LEFT JOIN zt_build tt2 on tt1.build = tt2.id LEFT JOIN zt_projectstory tt3 on tt3.project = tt2.project where tt1.id = #{srf.datacontext.release} ) or (select tt2.project from zt_release tt1 LEFT JOIN zt_build tt2 on tt1.build = tt2.id where tt1.id = #{srf.datacontext.release} ) = 0) AND t1.product = #{srf.datacontext.product} AND not FIND_IN_SET ( t1.ID,(SELECT STORIES FROM ZT_RELEASE WHERE ID = #{srf.datacontext.release} ))

SELECT t1.`COLOR`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`ID`, ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN COUNT( t.IBZ_FAVORITESID ) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS ISFAVORITES FROM T_IBZ_FAVORITES t WHERE t.TYPE = 'story' AND t.ACCOUNT = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} AND t.OBJECTID = t1.id ) AS `ISFAVORITES`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`PRI`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`TITLE`, '' AS isChild, t1.id FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.MODULE = t11.id LEFT JOIN zt_story t21 ON t1.PARENT = t21.id LEFT JOIN zt_product t31 ON t1.PRODUCT = t31.id
AND t1.`DELETED` = '0' AND FIND_IN_SET ( t1.ID, (SELECT STORIES FROM ZT_RELEASE WHERE ID = #{srf.datacontext.srfparentkey}))

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`, t1.`COLOR`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`ID`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`PRI`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`TITLE` , t1.STORYSN FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.MODULE = t11.ID LEFT JOIN zt_story t21 ON t1.PARENT = t21.ID LEFT JOIN zt_product t31 ON t1.PRODUCT = t31.ID LEFT JOIN zt_branch t41 ON t1.BRANCH = t41.ID
AND t1.`DELETED` = '0' AND FIND_IN_SET ( t1.ID, ( SELECT STORIES FROM ZT_TESTREPORT WHERE ID = $ { srfdatacontext ( 'srfparentkey', '{\"defname\":\"ID\",\"dename\":\"ZT_TESTREPORT \"}' ) } ) )

SELECT t1.`ID`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.STORYSN FROM `zt_story` t1
AND FIND_IN_SET ( t1.ID, (select tt.childStories from zt_story tt where tt.id = #{srf.datacontext.srfparentkey}))

SELECT t1.`ID`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.STORYSN FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.MODULE = t11.ID LEFT JOIN zt_story t21 ON t1.PARENT = t21.ID LEFT JOIN zt_product t31 ON t1.PRODUCT = t31.ID LEFT JOIN zt_branch t41 ON t1.BRANCH = t41.ID
AND FIND_IN_SET ( t1.ID, (select tt.linkStories from zt_story tt where tt.id = #{srf.datacontext.srfparentkey}))

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEDDATE`, t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`, t1.ASSIGNEDTO AS `ASSIGNEDTOPK`, t1.`BRANCH`, t41.`NAME` AS `BRANCHNAME`, t1.`CHILDSTORIES`, t1.`CLOSEDBY`, t1.`CLOSEDDATE`, t1.`CLOSEDREASON`, t1.`COLOR`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`DUPLICATESTORY`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`FROMBUG`, t1.`IBIZ_ID`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCEID`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCENAME`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCEOBJECT`, t1.`ID`, (case when t1.parent in (-1) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '1' when t1.parent in (0) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '2' else '0' end) AS `ISCHILD`, '0' AS `ISFAVORITES`, ( CASE WHEN t1.parent > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END ) AS `ISLEAF`, t1.`KEYWORDS`, t1.`LASTEDITEDBY`, t1.`LASTEDITEDDATE`, t1.`LINKSTORIES`, t1.`MAILTO`, '' AS `MAILTOPK`, t1.`MODULE`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, (case when t1.module = '0' then '/' else (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( tt.NAME SEPARATOR '>' ) FROM zt_module tt WHERE FIND_IN_SET( tt.id, t11.path ) AND tt.type = 'story' GROUP BY tt.root limit 0,1) end) AS `MODULENAME1`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`OPENEDDATE`, t1.`ORG`, t1.`ORGNAME`, t1.`PARENT`, t21.`TITLE` AS `PARENTNAME`, t11.`PATH`, t1.`PLAN`, (select GROUP_CONCAT(t.title) from zt_productplan t where t.deleted = '0' and t.id = t1.`PLAN`) AS `PLANNAME`, t1.`PRI`, t31.`name` AS `PRODOCTNAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`REVIEWEDBY`, t1.`REVIEWEDDATE`, t1.`SOURCE`, t1.`SOURCEID`, t1.`SOURCENAME`, t1.`SOURCENOTE`, t1.`SOURCEOBJECT`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STAGEDBY`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`STORYLATESTFINISHEDDATE`, t1.`STORYPOINTS`, t1.`STORYPROVIDEDATE`, t1.`STORYPROVIDER`, t1.`STORYSN`, t1.`SUBSTATUS`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`TOBUG`, t1.`TYPE`, t1.`VERSION`, t1.`VERSION` AS `VERSIONC` FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_module` t11 ON t1.`MODULE` = t11.`ID` LEFT JOIN `zt_story` t21 ON t1.`PARENT` = t21.`ID` LEFT JOIN `zt_product` t31 ON t1.`PRODUCT` = t31.`id` LEFT JOIN `zt_branch` t41 ON t1.`BRANCH` = t41.`ID`
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
AND ( 1<>1 )

SELECT t1.`BRANCH`, t1.`COLOR`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`ID`, t1.`MODULE`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`PARENT`, t11.`PATH`, t1.`PLAN`, t1.`PRI`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`STATUS`, CONCAT(t1.id,':',t1.title,'(优先级:',t1.pri,',预计工时:',t1.estimate,')') AS `TITLE`, t1.`TYPE`, t1.`VERSION`, t1.STORYSN FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.MODULE = t11.id LEFT JOIN zt_story t21 ON t1.PARENT = t21.id LEFT JOIN zt_product t31 ON t1.PRODUCT = t31.id LEFT JOIN zt_branch t41 ON t1.BRANCH = t41.id
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
AND (t1.`id` in (select tt.`story` from zt_projectstory tt where tt.`project` = #{srf.datacontext.project}) or t1.id = #{srf.datacontext.story})
AND (t1.module = #{srf.datacontext.module} or #{srf.datacontext.module} = '0' or #{srf.datacontext.module} is null)

SELECT t1.`ASSIGNEDDATE`, t1.`ASSIGNEDTO`, t1.ASSIGNEDTO AS `ASSIGNEDTOPK`, t1.`BRANCH`, t41.`NAME` AS `BRANCHNAME`, t1.`CHILDSTORIES`, t1.`CLOSEDBY`, t1.`CLOSEDDATE`, t1.`CLOSEDREASON`, t1.`COLOR`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`DUPLICATESTORY`, t1.`ESTIMATE`, t1.`FROMBUG`, t1.`IBIZ_ID`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCEID`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCENAME`, t1.`IBIZ_SOURCEOBJECT`, t1.`ID`, (case when t1.parent in (-1) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '1' when t1.parent in (0) and t1.stage = 'wait' then '2' else '0' end) AS `ISCHILD`, '0' AS `ISFAVORITES`, ( CASE WHEN t1.parent > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END ) AS `ISLEAF`, t1.`KEYWORDS`, t1.`LASTEDITEDBY`, t1.`LASTEDITEDDATE`, t1.`LINKSTORIES`, t1.`MAILTO`, '' AS `MAILTOPK`, t1.`MODULE`, t11.`NAME` AS `MODULENAME`, (case when t1.module = '0' then '/' else (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( tt.NAME SEPARATOR '>' ) FROM zt_module tt WHERE FIND_IN_SET( tt.id, t11.path ) AND tt.type = 'story' GROUP BY tt.root limit 0,1) end) AS `MODULENAME1`, t1.`OPENEDBY`, t1.`OPENEDDATE`, t1.`ORG`, t1.`ORGNAME`, t1.`PARENT`, t21.`TITLE` AS `PARENTNAME`, t11.`PATH`, t1.`PLAN`, (select GROUP_CONCAT(t.title) from zt_productplan t where t.deleted = '0' and t.id = t1.`PLAN`) AS `PLANNAME`, t1.`PRI`, t31.`name` AS `PRODOCTNAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`REVIEWEDBY`, t1.`REVIEWEDDATE`, t1.`SOURCE`, t1.`SOURCEID`, t1.`SOURCENAME`, t1.`SOURCENOTE`, t1.`SOURCEOBJECT`, t1.`STAGE`, t1.`STAGEDBY`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`STORYLATESTFINISHEDDATE`, t1.`STORYPOINTS`, t1.`STORYPROVIDEDATE`, t1.`STORYPROVIDER`, t1.`STORYSN`, t1.`SUBSTATUS`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`TOBUG`, t1.`TYPE`, t1.`VERSION`, t1.`VERSION` AS `VERSIONC` FROM `zt_story` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_module` t11 ON t1.`MODULE` = t11.`ID` LEFT JOIN `zt_story` t21 ON t1.`PARENT` = t21.`ID` LEFT JOIN `zt_product` t31 ON t1.`PRODUCT` = t31.`id` LEFT JOIN `zt_branch` t41 ON t1.`BRANCH` = t41.`ID`
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
